title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 14
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Aug. 14
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Solaris Oilfield Infrastructure, whose results for the quarter of its IPO were well received. They rallied after Solaris's second-quarter earnings per share and revenue beat analysts' average estimates in a Bloomberg survey. Use of the company's well-propping systems more than tripled from a year ago.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
